verses.name: Numbers 4:19
verses.text: But thus do unto them, that they may live, and not die, when they approach unto the most holy things: Aaron and his sons shall go in, and appoint them every one to his service and to his burden:

verses.name: Numbers 4:20
verses.text: But they shall not go in to see when the holy things are covered, lest they die.

verses.name: Numbers 4:21
verses.text: And the Lord spake unto Moses, saying,

verses.name: Numbers 4:22
verses.text: Take also the sum of the sons of Gershon, throughout the houses of their fathers, by their families;
